resources.string: By Using this application you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
For a better experience, turn on device location, which uses Google\'s location services.
We\'ve updated our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
Like any outdoor activity the app can be dangerous. Pay attention to your surroundings while you play.
Make Sure you turn on location services so we can show you nearby geocaces
There are over 3 million geocaches in the world. Join the community and discover real-world hidden treasure!

You won\'t take a physical container when you navigate to this geocache. You may be asked to take a photo, answer a question, or complete a task to prove you where there. Read the details to find out more.
This is the most common geocachr type Navigate to the geocache location and look for the hidden container. Read the detail of you get stuck, and don\'t forget to sign the logbook!
These geocache often use clues instead of exact coordinates. Read the details for instructions.

By using this application you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. After account creation, go to Name of app.com setting>Authorizations to change how your info is shred with Authorized Developers
Create an account to start finding geocaches!
User Name Already Registered. \nPlease choose another username
Choose a username to start finding geocaches!
Save a draft by toggling the draft option while logging a geocache.
Drafts are saved to your account so you can finish them from anywhere.
Unless otherwise specified on the Site, you may download the various applications accessible through the Site pursuant to the terms and conditions of the License

World Treasure \n\nâ€‹ A GeoCaching app. Real-world, outdoor, international treasure-hunt. Using GPS-enabled devices, participants navigate to a specific set of GPS coordinates and then attempt to find the \"clue/geocache\" hidden at that location. Join the World Treasure community
These geocaches often use clues instead of exact coordinates. Read the detail for instruction.
There are no trackables in your inventory. Search for trackables to add them to your inventory
write note to the trackable owner
Souvenirs are virtual pieces of art that you can earn and display on your public profile.\nGeocaching HQ releases digital souvenirs each year to celebrate special dates, places, and events.
Name must contain at least 5 characters
Only Alpha Numeric names are allowed
